question:
[Oscar] and his uncle [Roger] went to the movies Sunday after church and got popcorn and candy while they were there. [Joel] went to the car show with his sister [Nola] and his mother [Jamie]. [Sarah]'s son [Gregory] is turning nine today, so she is throwing him a party. [Nola] went to her brother [Oscar]'s birthday party [Julie] went to her brother [Gregory]'s birthday party [Julie] had a daughter named [Carolyn]. [Carolyn] wanted to visit an art museum, so she asked her father, [Roger] to take her.
Question: How is [Sarah] related to [Jamie]?

Based on the information provided, we can conclude that Sarah is related to Jamie through their children.
